documents.document: @Styla73 Just imagine tho. Sigh.
@Pseudony_Ms Ha, thx. And congrats to her! Always great to hear those finish line stories.

@Pseudony_Ms *Sharon immediately transfers uni & discipline for the view & food*
@bootstheory Need to extract this whole thread for Ms17 to read. She will totally +1.

@Styla73 @ToppTwins Every time I repost my Mururoa bombs at you, Kylie, I have the sound of NZ resistance music in my ears.
@chrishipkins @nzlabour @NZGreens Also watching this arvo to make sure your shared vision sets the tone to resist discrimination in NZ.
@chrishipkins As my MP I'm asking you to ensure that Labour strongly condemns Trump's #MuslimBan & also asks @pmbillenglish to do the same.
@Tea_plus_orange Him & Jacinda are PM & deputy-PM in my heart ;-) .

So much this! That's why I'm directing any energy I have to calling it out & resisting it right here! https://t.co/jsBGmRaUJk
As academic I know it's already hard for those from Global South to get visas to attend conferences in US. Many more voices not heard now.
